LanguageData.knownFactionsRecommendation: Faction Discovery: It is recommended to start with very few known factions. The lower the faction cap, the less likely you discover new factions.
LanguageData.ScenPart_KnownFactions: You know {0} friendly and {1} hostile factions at the beginning.
LanguageData.discoverAtStartText: You know of {0} other factions in the region. Over time you will discover more.
LanguageData.discoverAtDropText: As you drop onto the planet you are able to see {0} large settlements in the region. Over time you will discover more.
LanguageData.SettingSettlementFactorDesc: Multiplier for the amount of settlements for factions added to an existing game. Set to 0 for no settlements. (default = 0.7)
LanguageData.SettingSettlementsMinDesc: The minimum amount of settlements for factions added to an existing game. (default = 3)
LanguageData.SettingMinOfAnyFactionDesc: The minimum different factions to enforce of any kind of faction. (default = 1)
LanguageData.SettingMaxOfAnyFactionDesc: The maximum different factions to create of any kind of faction. Will not remove factions. (default = 2)
